name: One Room Less
description:
WE KNOW THAT THE GAME IS ACTUALLY NOT WORKING AS INTENDED. WE ARE ACTIVELY TRYING TO MAKE IT WORK.

Further details of the bug will be published soon.

VISIT ALL THE ROOMS ONLY ONCE.

When you exit a room, all the doors will close and you will have ONE ROOM LESS to visit. Trick your head around and solve the incoming puzzles.

CONTROLS

WASD - Player Movement

E - Interact (Open Door, Click Switch, Pick Item)

F - Drop Item

Mouse ScroolWheel - Change active Item

Tab - Change Camera mode | Follow Player or Automatic Room Focus

Made with ❤️ for the UDC 19 Game Jam by AleixFerre, Atalaya22 & Lluís Vinent
